alert.note: Alert for Baker; Coastal Duval; Coastal Nassau; Inland Nassau; Trout River; Western Duval (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 06 at 7:31AM EST by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT SOUTHERN NASSAU...EASTERN BAKER...NORTHERN DUVAL AND EXTREME SOUTHERN CHARLTON COUNTIES THROUGH 845 AM EST... At 730 AM EST, Doppler radar was tracking a cluster of strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near St. George to near Sanderson. Movement was east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts around 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Fernandina Beach, Callahan, Jacksonville International Arpt, Yulee, Macclenny, Glen St. Mary, Cisco Gardens, Amelia City, Little Talbot Island, and Bryceville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Baker; Coastal Duval; Coastal Nassau; Inland Nassau; Trout River; Western Duval
